website_summaries.verdict: Attractive copper-coated bucket with a classic look.
pros: Keeps ice cold and has a draining plate to let water drip away from the ice
cons: Some found that the lid does not fit very well

customer_reviews.title: It's purty!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this with some trepidation because some of the reviews were so negative. But others were extremely positive, so I took a chance. And am very pleased! It's a very attractive ice bucket and the accompanying tongs are substantial and pretty (and for some reason fascinated my old cat. I had to fight to get them back!) This is a remarkably fine item for the price and I'm sooo glad I took a chance on it! Thank you, Amazon! You came through like gangbusters!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea S

customer_reviews.title: Cute but lid is hard to open
customer_reviews.text: Ice bucket is cute but you damn near need to be he-man to remove the lid. Maybe overtime the lid will be easier to remove but I’m afraid the handle will become loose over time if not break trying to remove the lid. Not sure if it’s meant to be that way or if this is defective. Little disappointed but need it for a party this weekend. I’ll just leave it open and leave the lid off which just means ice will melt quicker.
customer_reviews.author: Kaveman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Ice Bucket
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy I chose this ice bucket. Some of the reviews mentioned dislike of the plastic liner. However, I really like that it is so easy to removed and clean if needed, plus the holes in the bottom help drain any water (it stays within the plastic part so it doesn't drip down to the copper part). Mine arrived in flawless condition. It's very pretty as part of my bar set and seems like it will hold up well. Plus the tongs that come with it are super cute! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Paige C.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This ice bucket is absolutely gorgeous and a complete shame that it came in such rough shape and doesn't operate well. It has a white plastic liner on the inside that came dirty as if it was used. The tongs were worn on the ends. The bucket itself was scratched. And the worst part was when you open the lid the whole liner comes with it. I'm not about to put something out for my guests and have them decipher how to make it work. So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Cabezuelo

customer_reviews.title: Love it~with limitations
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this ice bucket. It is so very attractive and looks beautiful on a decorated table. However, the white plastic insert and the bottom that allows the water drip through came “used” with cuts and dents in it. It even looked dirty. I had to scrub it clean and was still kinda nauseated. I was entertaining that weekend and didn’t have the opportunity to return it. I would give it 5 stars if not for that. It still gets me upset whenever I wash it. The outside however. Is very beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn M.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I really love the copper-hammered look and the bucket is removable with a disk in the bottom to keep ice from sitting in water as it melts. Should hold about 8 trays of ice or more, great size and look.
customer_reviews.author: Little Big elf

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty ice bucket but haven’t used it yet so I don’t know how well insulated it is to keep the ice. I don’t know if it mentioned it in the description but it has a drip pan on the bottom to collect water. This is my first ice bucket so that may be normal lol
customer_reviews.author: Joolzie

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, the the ice bucket lid is very difficult to remove, defeating its use as an ice bucket.
customer_reviews.text: Ice Bucket - Liner and Lid Do Not Fit. I sanded down the plastic liner and used kitchen spray to lube the lid, but it still very hard to remove the lid. The liner does not fasten to the container so when you try to lift the lid, the liner (and it’s ice) comes out of the container, leaving you holding the lid and the liner in your hand, I would not recommend the ice bucket to be used as an ice bucket. Maybe as an evensive planter or large too caddy. This ice bucket will not work as an ice bucket.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Buch

customer_reviews.title: Happy that I purchased this as a gift!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for a gift, so I don’t know anything about use or care. The first one came and had a scratch on the lid. I was able to return it and a new one was on the way before I returned the damaged one. I received the new one within days and it was perfect. I am very happy with this product and the way the return/exchange was handled.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, and Is Now Complete
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: Five stars! Not only did the replacement ice bucket come with the tongs, but the interior bucket was better than the original! Instead of being a plain liner bucket, it has a water-catcher section for the meltwater. I couldn't be more pleased! I just opened my new ice bucket, and t's stunningly beautiful but falls short of expectations because it arrived without the tongs. If the seller can fix the problem, this will become a 5 star review.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and unique
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and unique. Got lots of compliments at the party. The size is nice, not too big but holds enough ice to function well. Tongs are also pretty and useful. It arrived in perfect condition. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality seemed great. Haven’t used it yet but it looks great with other barware I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived used and scratched!
customer_reviews.text: I opened this and it appeared used inside. Dirty with scratches. The copper exterior was scratched as well. I will definitely be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Functional and attractive ice bucket
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect for entertaining. It’s an attractive container for holding ice and keeping it frozen!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice size
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful very nice finish Will be perfect with my set
customer_reviews.author: erum

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than photo showed
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty but is a lot smaller than I thought. I like it and I'll keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Parnell

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to parties; good quality; kept ice cold for hours and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Reiber

customer_reviews.title: Works well - keeps ice cold for a long time ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well - keeps ice cold for a long time. I just wish there was a hook to hang the tongs from the bucket.
customer_reviews.author: LPL

customer_reviews.title: Classic Look and Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Use it as countertop small trash bin. It adds a touch of class to our kitchen and the lid is perfect for isolating the garbage stench.
customer_reviews.author: PKMAN

customer_reviews.title: Visual and functional delight.
customer_reviews.text: Love the Ice Bucket. It is a handsome piece and a visual enhancement to the server it sits upon. I would recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: I C U
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful and got lots of compliments on it at the party!
customer_reviews.author: Lorelei

customer_reviews.title: but disappointed with what was inside the box
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with how fast the package came in the mail, but disappointed with what was inside the box. The lid had scratches, making it look as if it had been used. Then every time you tried pulling the top off, the entire inside of the ice bucket came with it, making it hard to use.
customer_reviews.author: Lyric Carmack

customer_reviews.title: Measurements Are Not True
customer_reviews.text: The Product color and quality are nice but the measurement description is 7 x 7 x 8.25 inches LxWxH is not true. The actual measurements are 6.5 x 6.5 x 6.5 inches LxWxH.
customer_reviews.author: John Mast

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The copper is super pretty. But the lid doesn’t fit properly. And the inside tub part arrived really dirty and smelled like a goat. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter's new bar cart as a Christmas gift. She LOVES it!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Delivered quickly, item greatly minimizes condensation due to interior liner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty...but tiny
customer_reviews.text: Too small to be functional for me. I purchased for family gatherings and it just wasn't big enough. Very pretty tho
customer_reviews.author: Claire turner

customer_reviews.title: the tongs provided are pretty much useless at picking up ice
customer_reviews.text: This ice bucket is lovely, but the lining inside looks a bit cheap in comparison to the exterior. Also, the tongs provided are pretty much useless at picking up ice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bucket for Bourbon Nights.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice looking and well made. The plastic bucket inside keeps the ice for a long time and the tray in the bottom keeps the water off the ice. I wanted a small bucket for bourbon nights with the buds and it is good without being too fancy.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: ... a few scuffs on the steel but it is nice looking and will do the job
customer_reviews.text: Not as thick material as we were expecting and it did show up with quite a few scuffs on the steel but it is nice looking and will do the job. Just wish it was better taken care of on the manufacturing and packaging end because its never too good when you give this as a gift and its already got scratches and scuffs on a color that really shows those flaws.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful ice bucket. It has a removable lining and very nice tongs. It would make a wonderful gift. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Receiver loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift for xmas 2018 that was on a wish list. They love it
customer_reviews.author: Bellabahlou

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift and I wish I had one for myself! It is cute and sturdy. The ice tongs are adorable and compliment the bucket well. It is cheaper than other retailers!
customer_reviews.author: caTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and beautiful to display on the table
customer_reviews.text: Loving my new ice bucket! I just wish it came in a bigger size. Elegant and beautiful to display on the table.
customer_reviews.author: Acieification

customer_reviews.title: I like the removable plastic liner - it's easy to clean ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. I like the removable plastic liner - it's easy to clean and the draining plate keeps ice out of the water.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Dewey

customer_reviews.title: I like that it has a liner and drain insert
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for group gatherings. I like that it has a liner and drain insert.
customer_reviews.author: B. Herzberg

product_meta.title: Old Dutch International Old Dutch Ice Bucket, 3 quart, Copper
product_meta.description: Our copper-plated ice bucket's simple, classic design will add a touch of class to any bar. Dressed to impress with its hand-hammered finish, its 3 qt. Capacity keeps plenty of ice on hand, while the removable liner with draining plate keeps your ice cold and dry. Exterior is coated with a Lacquered finish for tarnish resistance. you do not need to remove lacquer in order to use this ice bucket. ice bucket dimensions: 7” x 7” x 8.25” hand wash only with a damp cloth. A mild dish detergent solution may be used for cleaning. After washing, hand dry thoroughly. do not soak in water. Not dish washer safe.
feature_bullets: Beautiful Copper-Plating over durable stainless steel
Generous 3 Qt. capacity for plenty of ice!
Bonus: A set of solid brass ice tongs included
Exterior is coated with a lacquered finish for tarnish resistance.
Removable liner with draining plate helps keep  ice cold and dry.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars121 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
